titles.title: For the relief of Mrs. Florence Narusewicz of Erie, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 2/13/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a specified sum to Florence Narusewicz which represents the amount of an award for a disability incurred by her husband, during active military service in World War II, which was paid to him in two installment checks neither of which could be deposited or cashed by her after his death.
